Text: NCLHi I was looking thru some papers and I saw the Copy Club receipt of yours so I mailed it to you in case you need it to get reinbursedAlsoBecky Pearce and Kathy King said they would take over our newsletter jobs for the December issue since Sally Walker and I have seniors I think Becky Pearce wanted to do my job but thought Id let you talk to themThank youJoan Your favorite stores helpful shopping tools and great gift ideas Experience the convenience of buying online with etscape Get your own FREE personal Netscape Mail account today at
